price: Maka tatkala mereka membawanya dan sepakat memasukkannya ke dasar sumur (lalu mereka masukkan dia) dan (di waktu dia sudah dalam sumur) Kami wahyukan kepada  Yūsuf, "Sesungguhnya kamu akan menceritakan kepada mereka perbuatan mereka ini, sedang mereka tiada ingat lagi".
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَن يَجۡعَلُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ لَتُنَبِّئَنَّهُم بِأَمۡرِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahabū bihi wa-ajmaʿū an yajʿalūhu fī ghayābati al-jubi wa-awḥaynā ilayhi latunabbi-annahum bi-amrihim hādhā wahum lā yashʿurūna
